headline: Smart Food Packaging Markets Report 2025 with Analyst Recommendations - Rising Adoption of Blockchain and QR-Code Based Tracking / Expansion in Emerging Markets with Growing Food Processing Industries
summary: Explore the booming Global Smart Food Packaging Market, projected to grow from USD 26.90 Billion in 2024 to USD 41.11 Billion by 2031, with a CAGR of 5.39% from 2021 to 2024. Discover how technologies like Active Packaging, Intelligent Packaging, and MAP are driving innovations in food safety, sustainability, and transparency. Top regions include the Americas and Europe, with strong growth in Asia Pacific. Key players like Amcor, Sealed Air, and Tetra Pak lead the charge in this competitive land

headline: Amcor selects four startups for Lift-Off competition
summary: The selected teams will now undergo an evaluation process in collaboration with Amcor’s R&D and corporate venturing teams.
